attributes.action: make it school policy that all Primary Schools send all the children's schoolwork and workbooks home at the end of each school year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All children should be allowed to keep all their school work and any school workbooks at the end of each school year.  In many schools this has been discontinued, I wish it become common place again.  The children love to show their parents the work they have done, and the parents can see how they are progressing from year to year.  Afterall schooling is not just about about grades, it's about taking part in learning activities.
